entry.title: Thursday: Chance of flurries. High minus 18. POP 70%
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud with 70 percent chance of flurries. Wind north 20 km/h gusting to 40. High minus 18. Wind chill near minus 32. Risk of frostbite. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 11:30 AM EST Thursday 23 February 2023
